keymaps.name: Colemax
keymaps.description:
A special layout to be used with a base layer of Colemak configured on the PC. This layout has some unique assignments of Mod, Fn, and Mouse layers to make it compatible with maexxx' host-based scripts (AHK, keyd, Kanata, xkbd -- see Github - maxtend). Beware that on this layout, the Mod function is mapped to the Capslock position (Mouse key) as a secondary function. Primary is Backspace (normal for Colemak layouts).
Layers:
Basebaseus-qwerty (mapped to Colemak on the host OS)|Fn2fkeysfunction keys; experimental
Modmaxtendnavigation, editing|Fn3numtab3low number pad
Mousemousemouse functionality|Fn4numspacenumbers on home row, symbols above, parentheses below
Fnmediamedia / volume control, AltGr-compatibility|Fn5numtabhigh number pad

keymaps.name: HomeRowMods
keymaps.description: This keymap defines the keys for 'Homerow Mods'. The base layer has those keys defined WITHOUT mods, and the Mod layer has the keys defined WITH mods. This keymap cannot be used standalone. Its layers are used in macros as overlays to a regular full keymap (CMX) to turn homerow mods on and off.

keymaps.name: Nummax
keymaps.description:
A special layout to be used together with Colemax. This implements a NumLock layer for this layout.
This layout has some unique assignments of Mod, Fn, and Mouse layers to make it compatible with Max' AutoHotKey script Maxmax.ahk. Beware that on this layout, the Mod function is mapped to the Capslock position (Mouse key) as a secondary function. Primary is Backspace (normal for Colemak layouts).

keymaps.name: Pause
keymaps.description:
A special layout to be used with a base layer of Colemak configured on the PC.
This layout has some unique assignments of Mod, Fn, and Mouse layers to make it compatible with Max' AutoHotKey script Maxmax.ahk. Beware that on this layout, the Mod function is mapped to the Capslock position (Mouse key) as a secondary function. Primary is Backspace (normal for Colemak layouts).

macroActions.command:
replaceLayer mod CMX mod
replaceLayer mouse CMX mouse
replaceLayer fn CMX fn
replaceLayer fn2 CMX fn2
replaceLayer fn3 CMX fn3
replaceLayer fn4 CMX fn4
replaceLayer fn5 CMX fn5
set keymapAction.fn.isoKey macro initCMX
set keymapAction.fn.b macro Pause-or-b
fork keepAlive

setVar c 20
setLedTxt 1 CMX
startloop: delayUntil 250
ifNotKeymap CMX break
repeatFor c startloop
set backlight.keyRgb.base.128 128 128 128
set backlight.keyRgb.base.129 128 128 128
set backlight.keyRgb.base.130 128 128 128
set backlight.keyRgb.mod.128 0 128 0
set backlight.keyRgb.mod.129 0 128 0
set backlight.keyRgb.mod.130 0 128 0
set backlight.keyRgb.mouse.128 0 0 0
set backlight.keyRgb.mouse.129 0 128 128
set backlight.keyRgb.mouse.130 0 128 128
set backlight.keyRgb.fn.128 255 64 32
set backlight.keyRgb.fn.129 255 64 32
set backlight.keyRgb.fn.130 255 64 32
set backlight.keyRgb.fn5.128 128 128 128
set backlight.keyRgb.fn5.129 0 0 0
set backlight.keyRgb.fn5.130 0 0 0
ifKeymap CMX setLedTxt 200 "::C"
ifKeymap CMX setLedTxt 200 ":C:"
ifKeymap CMX setLedTxt 200 "C:M"
ifKeymap CMX setLedTxt 200 ":M:"
ifKeymap CMX setLedTxt 200 "M:X"
ifKeymap CMX setLedTxt 200 ":X:"
ifKeymap CMX setLedTxt 200 ":::"
ifKeymap CMX setLedTxt 200 "::C"
ifKeymap CMX setLedTxt 200 ":CM"
ifKeymap CMX setLedTxt 200 "CMX"
ifKeymap CMX setLedTxt 300 ":::"
ifKeymap CMX setLedTxt 300 "CMX"
ifKeymap CMX setLedTxt 300 ":::"
ifKeymap CMX setLedTxt 200 "CMX"

replaceLayer mod CMX mod
replaceLayer mouse CMX mouse
replaceLayer fn CMX fn
replaceLayer fn2 CMX fn2
replaceLayer fn3 CMX fn3
replaceLayer fn4 CMX fn4
replaceLayer fn5 CMX fn5
set keymapAction.fn.isoKey macro initCMX
set keymapAction.fn.slashAndQuestionMark macro initCMX

ifGesture timeoutIn 250 $thisKeyId final tapKey S-2
ifSecondary advancedStrategy final holdLayer mod
holdKey apostropheAndQuote
clearStatus

if ( $count > 0 ) final setVar count 0
setVar count 30
loop:
setLedTxt 1000 $count
repeatFor count loop
ifLayer fn5 final setLedTxt 0 "NUM"

diagnose
unToggleLayer
unToggleLayer
unToggleLayer
stopAllMacros

setLedTxt 900 MSE
setLedTxt 150 :SE
setLedTxt 150 S:E
setLedTxt 150 ::E
setLedTxt 150 :E:
setLedTxt 150 E::
setLedTxt 300 :::

ifShortcut timeoutIn 50 $keyId.rightSpace exec fn2-fkeys
holdLayer fn

setLedTxt 0 F12
holdLayer fn2
ifLayer fn4 final setLedTxt 0 '0-9'
setLedTxt 1 F12

setVar hrm_active 1
setVar hrm_timer_active 0
setVar hrm_tick 0
setVar hrm_tick_delay 10
setVar hrm_tick_active 8
setVar hrm_avoid_same 100
overlayLayer base HRM mod
setLedTxt 666 'H+-'
if ($hrm_timer_active == 0) fork hrm-timer

setVar hrm_tick 0
holdKey b

setVar hrm_tick 0
holdKey c

setVar hrm_tick 0
holdKey e

setVar hrm_tick 0
holdKey i

setLedTxt 666 'H-I'
exec hrm-auto

ifShortcut timeoutIn $hrm_avoid_same orGate noConsume y u i o p h j k l semicolonAndColon n m commaAndLessThanSign dotAndGreaterThanSign goTo primary
if ($hrm_active > 0) ifSecondary final holdKey leftAlt
primary:
setVar hrm_tick 0
holdKey semicolonAndColon

ifShortcut timeoutIn $hrm_avoid_same orGate noConsume q w e r t a s d f g z x c v b goTo primary
if ($hrm_active > 0) ifSecondary final holdKey leftAlt
primary:
setVar hrm_tick 0
holdKey a

ifShortcut timeoutIn $hrm_avoid_same orGate noConsume q w e r t a s d f g z x c v b goTo primary
if ($hrm_active > 0) ifSecondary final holdKey leftControl
primary:
setVar hrm_tick 0
holdKey f

ifShortcut timeoutIn $hrm_avoid_same orGate noConsume q w e r t a s d f g z x c v b goTo primary
if ($hrm_active > 0) ifSecondary final holdKey leftGui
primary:
setVar hrm_tick 0
holdKey g

ifShortcut timeoutIn $hrm_avoid_same orGate noConsume q w e r t a s d f g z x c v b goTo primary
if ($hrm_active > 0) ifSecondary final holdKey leftGui
primary:
setVar hrm_tick 0
holdKey s

ifShortcut timeoutIn $hrm_avoid_same orGate noConsume q w e r t a s d f g z x c v b goTo primary
if ($hrm_active > 0) ifSecondary final holdKey leftShift
primary:
setVar hrm_tick 0
holdKey d

setVar hrm_tick 0
holdKey m

setVar hrm_tick 0
holdKey n

setVar hrm_tick 0
holdKey o

setVar hrm_timer_active 0
setVar hrm_active 0
setVar hrm_avoid_same 50
overlayLayer base HRM base
setLedTxt 666 'H--'

setVar hrm_timer_active 0
setVar hrm_active 1
setVar hrm_avoid_same 50
overlayLayer base HRM mod
setLedTxt 666 'H++'

setVar hrm_tick 0
holdKey p

setVar hrm_tick 0
holdKey q

setVar hrm_tick 0
holdKey r

ifShortcut timeoutIn $hrm_avoid_same orGate noConsume y u i o p h j k l semicolonAndColon n m commaAndLessThanSign dotAndGreaterThanSign goTo primary
if ($hrm_active > 0) ifSecondary final holdKey rightAlt
primary:
setVar hrm_tick 0
holdKey slashAndQuestionMark

ifShortcut timeoutIn $hrm_avoid_same orGate noConsume q w e r t a s d f g z x c v b goTo primary
if ($hrm_active > 0) ifSecondary final holdKey rightAlt
primary:
setVar hrm_tick 0
holdKey backslashAndPipeIso

ifShortcut timeoutIn $hrm_avoid_same orGate noConsume y u i o p h j k l semicolonAndColon n m commaAndLessThanSign dotAndGreaterThanSign goTo primary
if ($hrm_active > 0) ifSecondary final holdKey rightControl
primary:
setVar hrm_tick 0
holdKey j

ifShortcut timeoutIn $hrm_avoid_same orGate noConsume y u i o p h j k l semicolonAndColon n m commaAndLessThanSign dotAndGreaterThanSign goTo primary
if ($hrm_active > 0) ifSecondary final holdKey rightGui
primary:
setVar hrm_tick 0
holdKey h

ifShortcut timeoutIn $hrm_avoid_same orGate noConsume y u i o p h j k l semicolonAndColon n m commaAndLessThanSign dotAndGreaterThanSign goTo primary
if ($hrm_active > 0) ifSecondary final holdKey rightGui
primary:
setVar hrm_tick 0
holdKey l

ifShortcut timeoutIn $hrm_avoid_same orGate noConsume y u i o p h j k l semicolonAndColon n m commaAndLessThanSign dotAndGreaterThanSign goTo primary
if ($hrm_active > 0) ifSecondary final holdKey rightShift
primary:
setVar hrm_tick 0
holdKey k

setVar hrm_tick 0
holdKey t

setVar hrm_tick 0
holdKey u

setVar hrm_tick 0
holdKey v

setVar hrm_tick 0
holdKey w

setVar hrm_tick 0
holdKey x

setVar hrm_tick 0
holdKey y

setVar hrm_tick 0
holdKey z
switchKeymap CMX

setVar count 6
startloop:
ifKeymap --- setLedTxt 200 "`-'"
ifKeymap --- setLedTxt 200 "---"
ifKeymap --- repeatFor count startloop
clearStatus
keepalive:

ifNotKeymap --- goTo final
ifKeymap --- setLedTxt 200 "---"
ifLayer mod goTo modLayerPt1
ifLayer fn5 goTo numLayerPt1
ifKeymap --- setLedTxt 200 "}--"
ifKeymap --- setLedTxt 200 "-}-"
ifKeymap --- setLedTxt 200 "--}"
goTo numLayerPt1End
numLayerPt1:
ifKeymap --- setLedTxt 200 "1--"
ifKeymap --- setLedTxt 200 "-2-"
ifKeymap --- setLedTxt 200 "--3"
goTo numLayerPt1End
modLayerPt1:
ifKeymap --- setLedTxt 200 "M--"
ifKeymap --- setLedTxt 200 "-A-"
ifKeymap --- setLedTxt 200 "--X"
numLayerPt1End:
ifNotKeymap --- goTo final

ifNotKeymap --- goTo final
ifKeymap --- setLedTxt 200 "---"
ifLayer mod goTo modLayerPt2
ifLayer fn5 goTo numLayerPt2
ifKeymap --- setLedTxt 200 "--{"
ifKeymap --- setLedTxt 200 "-{-"
ifKeymap --- setLedTxt 200 "{--"
goTo endPt2
numLayerPt2:
ifKeymap --- setLedTxt 200 "--3"
ifKeymap --- setLedTxt 200 "-2-"
ifKeymap --- setLedTxt 200 "1--"
goTo endPt2
modLayerPt2:
ifKeymap --- setLedTxt 200 "--X"
ifKeymap --- setLedTxt 200 "-A-"
ifKeymap --- setLedTxt 200 "M--"
endPt2:
ifNotKeymap --- goTo final
ifKeymap --- goTo keepalive

final: 
setLedTxt 800 "[-]"
setLedTxt 200 "[\\]"
setLedTxt 200 "[|]"
setLedTxt 200 "[/]"
setLedTxt 200 "[-]"
setLedTxt 200 "[\\]"
setLedTxt 200 "[|]"
setLedTxt 200 "[/]"
setLedTxt 200 "[-]"
setLedTxt 200 "[*]"
setLedTxt 200 "|_|"

setLedTxt 0 'KEY'
ifGesture timeoutIn 200 $thisKeyId final setLedTxt 999 'GST'
ifDoubletap final setLedTxt 999 'DBL'
delayUntilReleaseMax 500
ifInterrupted final setLedTxt 999 '2ND'
ifPlaytime 450 final setLedTxt 999 'HLD'
setLedTxt 999 'TAP'
#tapKey backslashAndPipe
#write Sheet #1
#tapKey enter
#write Sheet \1
#tapKey enter
#write Dhkkf \\1
#tapKey enter

tapKeySeq keypadPlus keypadPlus keypadPlus keypadPlus keypadPlus space B E G I N space keypadPlus keypadPlus keypadPlus keypadPlus keypadPlus space space enter
tapKeySeq keypadMinus keypadMinus np6 np4 keypadMinus graveAccentAndTilde space space enter
tapKeySeq keypadMinus keypadPlus np6 np4 keypadMinus LS-graveAccentAndTilde space space enter
tapKeySeq keypadMinus keypadAsterisk np6 np4 keypadMinus RA-graveAccentAndTilde space space enter
tapKeySeq keypadMinus keypadSlash np6 np4 keypadMinus RAS-graveAccentAndTilde space space enter
tapKeySeq keypadMinus keypadMinus np6 np5 keypadMinus 1 space space enter
tapKeySeq keypadMinus keypadPlus np6 np5 keypadMinus LS-1 space space enter
tapKeySeq keypadMinus keypadAsterisk np6 np5 keypadMinus RA-1 space space enter
tapKeySeq keypadMinus keypadSlash np6 np5 keypadMinus RAS-1 space space enter
tapKeySeq keypadMinus keypadMinus np6 np6 keypadMinus 2 space space enter
tapKeySeq keypadMinus keypadPlus np6 np6 keypadMinus LS-2 space space enter
tapKeySeq keypadMinus keypadAsterisk np6 np6 keypadMinus RA-2 space space enter
tapKeySeq keypadMinus keypadSlash np6 np6 keypadMinus RAS-2 space space enter
tapKeySeq keypadMinus keypadMinus np2 np4 keypadMinus commaAndLessThanSign space space enter
tapKeySeq keypadMinus keypadPlus np2 np4 keypadMinus LS-commaAndLessThanSign space space enter
tapKeySeq keypadMinus keypadAsterisk np2 np4 keypadMinus RA-commaAndLessThanSign space space enter
tapKeySeq keypadMinus keypadSlash np2 np4 keypadMinus RAS-commaAndLessThanSign space space enter
tapKeySeq keypadMinus keypadMinus np2 np5 keypadMinus dotAndGreaterThanSign space space enter
tapKeySeq keypadMinus keypadPlus np2 np5 keypadMinus LS-dotAndGreaterThanSign space space enter
tapKeySeq keypadMinus keypadAsterisk np2 np5 keypadMinus RA-dotAndGreaterThanSign space space enter
tapKeySeq keypadMinus keypadSlash np2 np5 keypadMinus RAS-dotAndGreaterThanSign space space enter
tapKeySeq keypadMinus keypadMinus np2 np6 keypadMinus slashAndQuestionMark space space enter
tapKeySeq keypadMinus keypadPlus np2 np6 keypadMinus LS-slashAndQuestionMark space space enter
tapKeySeq keypadMinus keypadAsterisk np2 np6 keypadMinus RA-slashAndQuestionMark space space enter
tapKeySeq keypadMinus keypadSlash np2 np6 keypadMinus RAS-slashAndQuestionMark space space enter
tapKeySeq keypadMinus keypadMinus keypadMinus keypadMinus keypadMinus space E N D space keypadMinus keypadMinus keypadMinus keypadMinus keypadMinus space space enter

ifDoubletap goTo doubleMaxtend
ifLayer fn goTo altMaxtend
ifShift goTo shiftMaxtend
ifAlt goTo altMaxtend
ifSecondary advancedStrategy goTo secondaryaction

primaryaction:
tapKey backspace
setLedTxt 500 "<--"
ifLayer fn5 final setLedTxt 0 "NUM"
break

secondaryaction:
setLedTxt 0 "MAX"
holdLayer mod
ifLayer fn5 final setLedTxt 0 "NUM"
setLedTxt 1 "MAX"
break

doubleMaxtend:
fork maxtend_showbackspace
shiftMaxtend:
setLedTxt 0 "<--"
suppressMods holdKey backspace
ifNotPlaytime 300 setLedTxt 300 "<--"
ifLayer fn5 final setLedTxt 0 "NUM"
setLedTxt 1 "<--"
break

altMaxtend:
setLedTxt 0 "DEL"
suppressMods holdKey delete
ifNotPlaytime 300 setLedTxt 300 "DEL"
ifLayer fn5 final setLedTxt 0 "NUM"
setLedTxt 1 "DEL"
break

setLedTxt 450 "<--"
ifReleased break
setLedTxt 0 "<<-"

ifShift goTo shiftMaxtend
//ifAlt final suppressMods holdKey delete
setLedTxt 0 MAX
holdLayer mod
ifReleased setLedTxt 1 MAX
ifInterrupted break
ifPlaytime 300 break
tapKey backspace
setLedTxt 500 <--
break
shiftMaxtend:
setLedTxt 0 <--
suppressMods holdKey backspace
ifReleased setLedTxt 1 MAX

ifDoubletap final holdKey space
ifSecondary goTo secondaryaction
primaryaction: final tapKey space
secondaryaction: 
setLedTxt 0 MSE
holdLayer mouse
setLedTxt 200 "MSE"
setLedTxt 200 "---"
setLedTxt 200 "___"
setLedTxt 300 ":::"
ifLayer fn5 final setLedTxt 0 "NUM"

ifSecondary final suppressMods holdKey LC-space
suppressMods tapKey LCLS-m
ifNotShift break
delayUntil 600
suppressMods tapKey LCLS-semicolonAndColon // CS-o on Colemak host
resolveNextKeyId

#ifDoubletap final holdKey space
ifSecondary goTo secondaryaction
primaryaction: final holdKey space
secondaryaction:
setLedTxt 0 '0-9'
holdLayer fn4
ifLayer fn5 final setLedTxt 0 "NUM"
setLedTxt 1 '0-9'

ifDoubletap final holdKey tab
ifAlt final holdKey tab
ifSecondary advancedStrategy goTo secondaryaction

primaryaction:
ifShift goTo shiftTab
tapKey tab
setLedTxt 500 "->|"
ifLayer fn5 final setLedTxt 0 "NUM"
break

secondaryaction:
ifShift goTo shiftTabSecondary
setLedTxt 0 "NUM"
holdLayer fn5
delayUntil 100
ifLayer fn5 final setLedTxt 0 "NUM"
setLedTxt 1 "NUM"
break

shiftTabSecondary:
setLedTxt 0 "NUM"
ifNotLayer fn5 final toggleLayer fn5
unToggleLayer
setLedTxt 1 "NUM"
break

shiftTab:
setLedTxt 0 "|<-"
holdKey tab
setLedTxt 500 "|<-"
ifLayer fn5 final setLedTxt 0 "NUM"
break

ifAlt final holdKey tab
ifSecondary advancedStrategy goTo secondaryaction

primaryaction:
ifShift goTo shiftTab
tapKey tab
setLedTxt 500 "->|"
ifLayer fn3 final setLedTxt 0 "123"
break

secondaryaction:
ifShift goTo shiftTabSecondary
setLedTxt 0 "123"
holdLayer fn3
delayUntil 100
ifLayer fn3 final setLedTxt 0 "123"
setLedTxt 1 "123"
break

shiftTabSecondary:
setLedTxt 0 "123"
ifNotLayer fn3 final toggleLayer fn3
unToggleLayer
setLedTxt 1 "123"
break

shiftTab:
setLedTxt 0 "|<-"
holdKey tab
setLedTxt 500 "|<-"
ifLayer fn3 final setLedTxt 0 "123"
break

setLedTxt 0 '123'
holdLayer fn3
setLedTxt 1 '123'
printStatus

setVar safetyMargin ($safetyMargin - 5)
set secondaryRole.advanced.safetyMargin $safetyMargin
if ( $safetyMargin < 0 ) final setLedTxt 500 "$safetyMargin"
setLedTxt 500 "+$safetyMargin"

setVar safetyMargin ($safetyMargin + 5)
set secondaryRole.advanced.safetyMargin $safetyMargin
if ( $safetyMargin < 0 ) final setLedTxt 500 "$safetyMargin"
setLedTxt 500 "+$safetyMargin"

if ($thisKeyId == $keyId.j) setVar snap_mode 1
else if ($thisKeyId == $keyId.l) setVar snap_mode 2
else setVar snap_mode 0
if ($snap_running == 0) fork snap-leftright-worker
delayUntilRelease
ifKeyActive $keyId.j final setVar snap_mode 1
ifKeyActive $keyId.l final setVar snap_mode 2
setVar snap_mode 0

setLedTxt 1 'CMX'
// switchKeymap CMX
untoggleLayer
holdKey space

setLedTxt 500 'SPC'
loop:
delayUntil 4000
ifInterrupted final setLedTxt 1500 'OFF'
tapKey space
setLedTxt 1000 'SPC'
goTo loop

ifSecondary final suppressMods holdKey oRC-
ifShift suppressMods write Wharf33
else ifCtrl suppressMods write Whorf34
else {
    delayUntil 200
    suppressMods tapKeySeq m h a n t s c h
}

ifGesture timeoutIn 1500 a final setLedTxt 666 'X-A'
ifGesture timeoutIn 1500 b final setLedTxt 666 'X-B'
ifGesture timeoutIn 1500 c 1 final setLedTxt 666 'XC1'
ifGesture timeoutIn 1500 c 2 final setLedTxt 666 'XC2'
ifGesture timeoutIn 1500 noConsume orGate j k l u i o 7 8 9 m final {
    //switchKeymap NMX
    toggleLayer fn5
    set keymapAction.fn5.leftSpace macro spaceback
    set keymapAction.fn5.rightSpace macro spaceback
    setLedTxt 0 '1NM'
}
ifGesture timeoutIn 1500 k final tapKey x
ifGesture timeoutIn 1500 orGate l final tapKey y
setLedTxt 666 'NON'
